entity.name: Swamp People
entity.description: Think you've seen all of "Swamp People" that there is to see? Think again. "Swamp People: Blood and Guts" seeks to make previously aired episodes of the reality show new by offering updated information in an enhanced format of the episodes.The show features descendants of French Canadian refugees who settled in Louisiana's swamp region in the 18th century. The members of the group struggle to preserve their way of life in Atchafalaya Basin during alligator-hunting season, the most important time of the year for them.
